title: Is steganography a good topic for my MSc Project? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes . There are at least two approaches to the answer to this question. I will describe an approach that is rewarding but difficult. At the end of this description I describe an alternative. THE DIFFICULT BUT REWARDING APPROACH. You must have: The right advisor who is smart enough to understand the problem and the research possibilities .The systems background ( Not just IT systems) to be able to identify the systems and subsystems involved and their interaction as well as the control systems and their operational control function.A source of funding so that you have enough free time to do the work.The commitment to a career path that demands deep and continuous research.Proof that you are capable of something more than a technical journalism article. It should be noted that there is nothing wrong with that approach and many MS thesis are written that way.
